      • loadConfiguration

        public SearchIndexerConfigurationHolder loadConfiguration(String locationUrl)
        This method reads the configuration from the given location. The configuration data is parsed according to its format (typically XML) and returned as JaxbBeanHolder.
        Specified by:
        loadConfiguration in interface SearchConfigurationLoader
        Specified by:
        loadConfiguration in interface SearchIndexerConfigurationLoader
        Parameters:
        locationUrl - is the location where the SearchConfiguration data shall be read from. This is typically a path into the filesystem (e.g. "file://~/.mmm/search.xml"). Please note that "file://" can be omitted.
        Returns:
        the JaxbBeanHolder.

      • validate

        protected void validate(SearchIndexerConfigurationBean jaxbBean)
        This method is invoked after the jaxbBean has been loaded and before it is saved. It does nothing by default but can be overridden to implement custom validation logic.
        Overrides:
        validate in class XmlBeanMapper<SearchIndexerConfigurationBean>
        Parameters:
        jaxbBean - is the JAXB bean to validate.

      • validateConfiguration

        Specified by:

        Parameters:

        Throws:
